Package gov.sandia.geotess

Class ProfileNPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.sandia.geotess.Profile
      • gov.sandia.geotess.ProfileNPoint
  • public class ProfileNPoint
extends Profile
    A Profile defined by two or more radii and an equal number of Data objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Data[] data
      nPoints array containing the Data objects associated with each node on this profile.
      protected boolean[] gradientReciprocal
      The reciprocal flag for each stored gradient.
      protected float[] radii
      nPoints array containing the radii of the nodes on this profile.

    • Field Detail

      • radii

        protected float[] radii
        nPoints array containing the radii of the nodes on this profile.

      • data

        protected Data[] data
        nPoints array containing the Data objects associated with each node on this profile.

      • gradientReciprocal

        protected boolean[] gradientReciprocal
        The reciprocal flag for each stored gradient. If true and the gradient for attribute i is defined (gradients[i] != null), then the stored gradient is reciprocal for the defined attribute (e.g. the Reciprocal of SSLOWNESS is the S wave velocity).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProfileNPoint

        public ProfileNPoint​(float[] radii,
                     Data[] data)
              throws GeoTessException
        Parameterized constructor that takes an array of radius values and an equal-size array of Data objects. This Profile keeps a reference to the supplied radii, and Data objects (no copy is made).
        Parameters:
        radii - 2 or more monotonically increasing radius values
        data - array of Data objects. Length must equal number of radii.
        Throws:
        GeoTessException - if radii.length < 2 or radii.length != data.length or radii are not monotonically increasing.

      • getData

        public Data[] getData()
        Description copied from class: Profile
        Retrieve a shallow copy of the array of Data objects associated with this profile. The number of elements depends on ProfileType:
        • EMPTY -- 0
        • THIN -- 1
        • CONSTANT -- 1
        • NPOINT -- N
        • SURFACE -- 1
        • SURFACE_EMPTY -- 0
        Specified by:
        getData in class Profile
        Returns:
        Data[]

      • getData

        public Data getData​(int i)
        Description copied from class: Profile
        Retrieve a reference the i'th Data object.
        • ProfileEmpty - returns null
        • ProfileThin - i is ignored. Always returns Data[0]
        • ProfileConstant - i is ignored. Always returns Data[0]
        • ProfileNPoint - throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if i is out of range
        • ProfileSurface - i is ignored. Always returns Data[0]
        • ProfileSurfaceEmpty - returns null
        Specified by:
        getData in class Profile
        Returns:
        Data

      • setData

        public void setData​(Data... data)
        Replace the Data[] currently associated with this ProfileNPoint with a new Data[]
        Specified by:
        setData in class Profile
        Parameters:
        data - a data array of size equal to the number of radii

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius​(int index)
        Description copied from class: Profile
        Get the i'th radius value in this profile in km. Radii are in order of increasing radius.

        Behavior when i is out-of-bounds:

        • ProfileEmpty - i == 0 ? radii[0] : radii[1]
        • ProfileThin - always returns radii[0]
        • ProfileConstant - i == 0 ? radii[0] : radii[1]
        • ProfileNPoint - throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if i is out of range
        • ProfileSurface - always return Double.NaN
        Specified by:
        getRadius in class Profile
        Returns:
        the i'th radius value in this profile in km.

                      float radius)

      • getRadii

        public float[] getRadii()
        Description copied from class: Profile
        Get the radii values in km. For ProfileNPoint object, returns a reference to the profiles radii array. The other profile classes return a new float[] that contains the available radius values. ProfileSurface returns new float[0].
        Specified by:
        getRadii in class Profile
        Returns:
        the radii values in km.

      • getValue

        public double getValue​(gov.sandia.gmp.util.globals.InterpolatorType interpType,
                       int attributeIndex,
                       double radius,
                       boolean allowOutOfRange)
        Retrieve the value of the specified attribute interpolated at the specified radius. If radius is less than radiusBottom then the first Data value is returned. If radius is greater than radiusTop then the last Data value is returned.
        Overrides:
        getValue in class Profile
        Parameters:
        interpType - either InterolatorType.LINEAR or InterpolatorType.SPLINE.
        attributeIndex - the index of the attribute whose value is to be computed
        radius - the radius of the interpolation point, in km.
        Returns:
        interpolated value.

      • isNaN

        public boolean isNaN​(int nodeIndex,
                     int attributeIndex)
        Description copied from class: Profile
        Return true if the specified Data value is NaN. For doubles and floats, this means not NaN. For bytes, shorts, ints and longs, always returns false since there is no value that is NaN
        Specified by:
        isNaN in class Profile

      • getData

        public Data getData​(gov.sandia.gmp.util.globals.InterpolatorType interpType,
                    double radius,
                    boolean allowOutOfRange)
             throws GeoTessException
        Retrieve a new Data object of the same DataType and with the same number of attributes, with values interpolated from this Profile at the specified radius.
        Parameters:
        interpType -
        radius -
        allowOutOfRange - if true and radius is out of range, values at top or bottom of the Profile will be returned.
        Returns:
        a new Data object of the same DataType and with the same number of attributes, with values interpolated from this Profile at the specified radius.
        Throws:
        GeoTessException

      • getRadiusIndex

        public int getRadiusIndex​(float radius)
        Find index i such that x is >= xx[i] and < xx[i+1]. If x < xx[0] returns -1. If x == xx[xx.length-1] return xx.length-2 If x > xx[xx.length-1] return xx.length-1

        This method is translation from Numerical Recipes in C++.

        Parameters:
        radius -

      • getRadiusIndex

        public int getRadiusIndex​(double radius)
        Find index i such that x is >= xx[i] and < xx[i+1]. If x < xx[0] returns -1. If x == xx[xx.length-1] return xx.length-2 If x > xx[xx.length-1] return xx.length-1

        This method is translation from Numerical Recipes in C++.

        Overrides:
        getRadiusIndex in class Profile
        Parameters:
        radius -
        Returns:
        index i such that radius is >= radii[i] and < radii[i+1].

      • setPointIndex

        public void setPointIndex​(int nodeIndex,
                          int pointIndex)
        Set the pointIndex that corresponds to the supplied nodeIndex.

        There is a node index for each Data object in a profile and they are indexed from 0 to the number of Data objects managed by a Profile. There is a pointIndex for every Data object in the entire model, indexed from 0 to the number of Data objects in the model.

        Specified by:
        setPointIndex in class Profile
        Parameters:
        nodeIndex -
        pointIndex -

      • resetPointIndices

        Specified by:
        resetPointIndices in class Profile

      • getPointIndex

        public int getPointIndex​(int nodeIndex)
        Get the pointIndex that corresponds to the supplied nodeIndex.

        There is a node index for each Data object in a profile and they are indexed from 0 to the number of Data objects managed by a Profile. There is a pointIndex for every Data object in the entire model, indexed from 0 to the number of Data objects in the model.

        Specified by:
        getPointIndex in class Profile
        Parameters:
        nodeIndex -
        Returns:
        poitnIndex

      • getPointIndices

        public void getPointIndices​(float radius,
                            java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> points)
        Description copied from class: Profile
        Find the point indeces of the nodes above and below the specified radius and add them to the supplied list of points. Point index values of -1 are not added to the set. The set is not cleared before addition.
        Overrides:
        getPointIndices in class Profile

      • integrate

        public double integrate​(int attributeIndex,
                        boolean reciprocal)
        Performs Trapezoidal integration of the requested attribute, or it's reciprocal over the depth of the profile. The result is returned on exit.
        Overrides:
        integrate in class Profile
        Parameters:
        attributeIndex - The index of the attribute whose integral is returned.
        reciprocal - If true the reciprocal attribute is integrated over the profile depth.
        Returns:
        the integration result.

      • computeGradients

        protected void computeGradients​(GeoTessModel model,
                                int attributeIndex,
                                double[] unitVector,
                                int layerId,
                                boolean reciprocal)
                         throws GeoTessException
        Synchronized method to compute the gradient of a NPoint layer. Does nothing if gradient is already computed.
        Overrides:
        computeGradients in class Profile
        Parameters:
        model - GeoTessModel for which gradients are evaluated.
        attributeIndex - The attribute for which gradients are calculated.
        unitVector -
        layerId -
        reciprocal - A boolean flag, that if true, stores the gradient of the inverse attribute field.
        Throws:
        GeoTessException
